name: Wavering Eyes
description:
Destroy as many cards in each player's Pendulum Zones as possible, then apply these effects, in sequence, depending on the number of cards destroyed by this effect.
â— 1 or more: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.
â— 2 or more: You can add 1 Pendulum Monster from your Main Deck to your hand.
â— 3 or more: You can banish 1 card on the field.
â— 4: You can add 1 "Wavering Eyes" from your Deck to your hand.
